text:
www.popsugar.com / Tuesday, 24 April 2018 15:10:03

Kim Kardashian is getting ready to launch her new body-inspired KKW fragrance, so what better way to promote it than by showing off her own naked body, right? On Tuesday, the 37-year-old reality TV star shared a series of social media photos of herself in the buff, and fair warning: these are not for the faint of heart. Kim, of course, is no stranger to showing off her famous curves. In fact, she's practically made it her goal this year to share at least one nude photo every month. Even so, these may just be her raciest pictures yet!
title: Kim Kardashian Appears Nude and Touches Herself in NSFW Fragrance Ad
